properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 11:08AM CST until February 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Louisiana...

Calcasieu River Near Oberlin

...Observed Flooding Changed from Minor to Nonflood Severity for the
following rivers in Louisiana...
...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for the
following rivers in Louisiana...
Atchafalaya River At Morgan City

The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Calcasieu River Near Oberlin.
* from Saturday morning to Sunday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 10:15 AM Friday the stage was 12.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise to flood stage
tomorrow morning.
* Impact...At stages near 13.0 feet...Minor lowland flooding near
the river will occur.
* Impact...At stages near 12.0 feet...Water begins to overflow the
banks on both sides of the river.
